Package com.jsheets.util

Class AutoSaveTimer

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.Timer
com.jsheets.util.AutoSaveTimer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AutoSaveTimer extends Timer
Saves the current session at the given interval, using the SessionService's saveCurrentSession method.
